project.projtitle: Software ENgineering in Enterprise Cloud Applications
project.funding_agency: SENECA is a European Industrial Doctorate project, funded under Marie-Sk≈Çodowska Curie Actions.

partner.shortname: SINGULARLOGIC Anonymi Etairia Pliroforiakon Sistimaton Kai Efarmogon Pliroforikis
Athens University of Economics and Business - Reseach Center

project.description: The project provides the opportunity to nine early-stage researchers to pursue their PhD in the area of software engineering of cloud-based systems. The research programme is organized in three research streams: A) Product quality in cloud-related software development projects B) Process quality in cloud-related software development C) Operations' quality in cloud systems.
